document.title: Privacy Policy
document.description: Read our privacy policy for Sage AI.

body.raw:
This Privacy Policy describes how Sage AI ("we", "us", or "our") collects, uses, and shares your personal information when you use our service.

## 1. Information We Collect

1.1 We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, subscribe to our service, or communicate with us.

1.2 We automatically collect certain information about your device and how you interact with our service, including your IP address, browser type, and usage data.

## 2. How We Use Your Information

2.1 We use your information to provide, maintain, and improve our service, process transactions, send you technical notices and support messages, and respond to your comments and questions.

2.2 We may use your information to send you promotional communications about new features or products, but you can opt out of these communications.

## 3. How We Share Your Information

3.1 We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with service providers who assist us in providing the service, or as required by law.

## 4. Data Retention

4.1 We retain your information for as long as necessary to provide the service and fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy.

## 5. Your Rights

5.1 You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You may also have additional rights depending on your jurisdiction.

## 6. Changes to This Policy

6.1 We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.

## 7. Contact Us

7.1 If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at sreeaadhi07@icloud.com.

Last updated: July 10, 2024

document.title: Refund Policy
document.description: Read our refund policy for Sage AI.

body.raw:
This Refund Policy outlines the terms under which Sage AI may provide refunds for our services.

## 1. Monthly Subscription Refunds

1.1 We do not typically offer refunds for our monthly subscription service. However, we may consider refunds on a case-by-case basis for exceptional circumstances.

## 2. Pay-Per-Report Refunds

2.1 For our pay-per-report option, we offer refunds within 24 hours of report generation if the report does not meet the described specifications due to a technical error on our part.

## 3. Refund Process

3.1 To request a refund, please contact us at sreeaadhi07@icloud.com with your account details and the reason for your refund request.

3.2 We will review your request and respond within 5 business days.

## 4. Exclusions

4.1 We do not offer refunds for:
   - Unused subscription time if you cancel your subscription mid-cycle
   - Reports that have been accessed or downloaded
   - Subscriptions that have been active for more than 7 days

## 5. Payment of Refunds

5.1 Approved refunds will be issued using the original method of payment.

## 6. Changes to This Policy

6.1 We reserve the right to modify this Refund Policy at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website.

## 7. Contact Us

7.1 If you have any questions about this Refund Policy, please contact us at sreeaadhi07@icloud.com.

Last updated: July 10, 2024

document.title: Terms of Service
document.description: Read our terms of service for Sage AI.

body.raw:
These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of Sage AI (the "Service") provided by Sree Narayanan ("Provider," "we," "us," or "our"). By accessing or using the Service, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, you may not use the Service.

## 1. Service Description

1.1 Sage AI is an AI-powered market intelligence tool that aggregates and analyzes data to provide market insights.

## 2. User Accounts

2.1 You may need to create an account to use certain features of the Service. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information.

## 3. Payment and Subscription

3.1 We offer a monthly subscription plan and a pay-per-report option. Prices are as specified on our website.

3.2 Subscription fees are billed in advance and are non-refundable except as provided in our Refund Policy.

## 4. Data and Privacy

4.1 Our use of your data is governed by our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated into these Terms by reference.

## 5. Intellectual Property

5.1 All intellectual property rights in the Service remain with the Provider.

5.2 You may not modify, adapt, or create derivative works based on the Service.

## 6. Limitation of Liability

6.1 To the extent permitted by law, we shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenue, arising out of or in connection with the use of the Service.

## 7. Termination

7.1 We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your access to the Service at our sole discretion, without notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms or is harmful to other users of the Service, us, or third parties, or for any other reason.

## 8. Changes to Terms

8.1 We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. If we make material changes, we will provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect.

## 9. Governing Law

9.1 These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India.

## 10. Contact Us

10.1 If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at sreeaadhi07@icloud.com.

By using the Service, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms.

Last updated: July 10, 2024
